description: Detection pipelines that cover the scan taxonomy (memory/binary safety, protocol/serialization, configuration, crypto/session, network, privilege) and synthesize findings.
steps: Define scan taxonomy and map detectors to categories (memory, protocol, config, session, network, privilege)
Implement heuristics, fuzzers, and PoV checks for each category that emit structured findings
Merge pipeline outputs into a common evidence model with severity/confidence metadata
Ensure detectors operate safely (non-destructive) and respect target-safe policies
Validate coverage via integration tests exercising each pipeline against lab services
acceptance_criteria: Every scan category from the README is exercised by at least one detector
Findings include severity, confidence, module metadata, and proof artifacts
Detectors can be turned on/off via policies without code changes
